showcases.title: Netmatters Replica
showcases.description: This is a replica of the Netmatters homepage. It was an assessment as part of the Scion Coalition Scheme with Netmatters. The website was built using PHP, CSS and JavaScript.

showcases.title: JS Array & API Practice
showcases.description: This is a simple website that uses JavaScript to fetch data from an API and display it on the page. It also has a search function that filters the data based on the user's input.
